## Install

![GO](https://img.shields.io/github/go-mod/go-version/go-sdk/pb?style=for-the-badge)
![Release](https://img.shields.io/github/v/release/go-sdk/pb?display_name=tag&style=for-the-badge)

```shell
go get -u github.com/go-sdk/pb
```
